document.full_text: bob simpson, 94, and his wife, anna, 92, left their lifelong home in cairo, ill., because of the threat by the overfed mississippi and ohio rivers.
document.title: voices from the storm | bob and anna simpson, la center, ky.: uprooted by rising waters, but not ready to walk away
